translations.landing.index.counter.recordOnceDesc: Show Flyto2 how you work. It learns by watching your clicks and keystrokes.
translations.landing.index.counter.replayForeverDesc: Run it again with different data. Batch process hundreds of items.
translations.landing.index.counter.stayInControlDesc: Pause, verify, and resume anytime. Never worry about runaway automation.
translations.landing.index.hero.description: Flyto2 is an automation tool that operates your computer like a human. Open browsers, click buttons, fill forms, upload files. You do it once, Flyto2 repeats it forever.
translations.landing.index.why.subtitle: Many tasks aren't hard, they're just tedious.
translations.landing.index.why.title: Why
